params.user: The address of the user whose stake information is requested.

returns.amount: The total amount of tokens the user has staked.
returns.exists: A boolean indicating whether the user currently has an active stake.
returns.startTimestamp: The timestamp when the user's stake started.

stakes(address).notice: Retrieves the staking information for a given user.

documentation.text:
@title IStaking Interface
 @notice Defines the interface for querying user stakes in the staking contract.
